subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: Related to {{och-l|乏|to lack; to neglect}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|འབབ||to go down; to move downward; to descend; calamity}}, {{m|bo|འབེབས||to cause to fall; to bring down}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Also compare {{cog|th|บอบ||weak, worn out, run down}} ([[ibid.]]).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} {{lb|zh|of house}} to [[collapse]]
# to [[abandon]]; to [[abrogate]]; to [[abolish]]
# [[abandoned]]; [[deserted]]
# to [[stop]]; to [[terminate]]
# to [[oust]]; to [[dethrone]]
# {{†}} to [[decline]]; to [[decay]]; to [[ruin]]
# [[disabled]]; [[handicapped]]; [[crippled]]
# {{†}} [[decayed]]; [[spoiled]]; [[bad]]
# {{†}} to [[neglect]]; to [[disregard]]; to [[overlook]]
# [[useless]]; [[disused]]
# [[waste]]; [[unwanted]] [[material]]
# {{†}} to [[fall]]; to [[drop]]
# {{†}} to [[kill]]; to [[slay]]
# {{†}} to [[lay]] down
# {{†}} to [[waste]]; to [[squander]]
# {{†}} {{zh-alt-form|發|to [[take place]]; to [[happen]]}}
# [[dejected]]; [[dispirited]]
